typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as short,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as double,
		Column_6 as double,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as double,
		Column_9 as short,
		Column_10 as short,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourcedf
sourcedf derive(Column_2 = '*********') ~> derivedcolumn
derivedcolumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkdf
